messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] To blog or not
messages.msgSnippet: unschoolingbasicsWhy would the state be reading your blog? And what are you doing that would make you think anyone should come knocking on your door?
messages.messageBody:
unschoolingbasicsWhy would "the state" be reading your blog? And what are you doing that would make you think anyone should come knocking on your door? Nothing, I would guess. Relax and enjoy.

Nance

********************


1a.
To blog or not to blog?
Posted by: "Adrean Clark" adrean@... fuzzyellowduck
Thu Nov 8, 2007 7:22 am (PST)
I noticed some of you have blogs. I'm thinking abt setting one up so my
husband and family can keep in touch with what we're doing and for
myself to keep track on how we're going. Some of you have blogs, so I'm
curious --- since its a public thing, what should I leave public or keep
out? What would cause the state to come knocking on my door?
--Adrean



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
